body:
Recently added patch to port the LLVM 9.0.0 ICE with OpenBLAS and AVX-512 instructions as well to AppleClang (11.0.3).

This fixes the ICE on the latest macOS builds with OpenBLAS which in turn enables building `py-numpy` and the rest of the python stack again.

cc @rubendibattista @s-sajid-ali @LDAmorim 

Refs.:
- https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/pull/2329#issuecomment-623681496
- https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/pull/2597
title: OpenBLAS: Fix LLVM 9.0.0 ICE on macOS
